DOC.brief_summary: This is an investigation of the efficacy and safety of CRD007 compared to placebo in the treatment of patients with abdominal aortic aneurysm.
DOC.brief_title: CRD007 for the Treatment of Abdominal Aorta Aneurysm (The AORTA Trial)
DOC.criteria: Infrarenal abdominal aortic aneurysm Previous infrarenal aortic surgery Known diabetes
